text: "Bed of Roses" is a 1993 song by the American rock band Bon Jovi and is the second single from their fifth studio album Keep the Faith (1992). It went to number 2 in Canada, number 4 in Iceland, number 9 in the Netherlands and Switzerland, number 10 in Australia, Germany, Portugal and the United States and number 13 in New Zealand and the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1993 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: Bed of Roses (Bon Jovi song)
